directions: In a blender or food processor, combine banana, orange juice, lime juice, poppy seeds, raspberry vinegar, olive oil, raspberries, salt and cayenne pepper, and puree until smooth.  Cover tightly and refrigerate until ready to use.
Combine grapes, watermelon, strawberries, cantaloupe, blueberries and plums in a large bowl.  Pour dressing over fruit and toss to coat.
title: Fresh Fruit with Poppy Seed Dressing
